trailingComments.value:
*
 * An optimised convolution shader material.
 *
 * Based on the GDC2003 Presentation by Masaki Kawase, Bunkasha Games:
 *  Frame Buffer Postprocessing Effects in DOUBLE-S.T.E.A.L (Wreckless)
 * and an article by Filip Strugar, Intel:
 *  An investigation of fast real-time GPU-based image blur algorithms
 *
 * Further modified according to:
 *  https://developer.apple.com/library/ios/documentation/3DDrawing/Conceptual/OpenGLES_ProgrammingGuide/BestPracticesforShaders/BestPracticesforShaders.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP40008793-CH7-SW15
 *
 * @class ConvolutionMaterial
 * @submodule materials
 * @extends ShaderMaterial
 * @constructor
 * @param {Vector2} [texelSize] - The absolute screen texel size.

*
		 * The current kernel size.
		 *
		 * @property kernelSize
		 * @type KernelSize
		 * @default KernelSize.LARGE

leadingComments.value:
*
		 * The current kernel size.
		 *
		 * @property kernelSize
		 * @type KernelSize
		 * @default KernelSize.LARGE

trailingComments.value:
*
	 * Returns the kernel.
	 *
	 * @method getKernel
	 * @return {Float32Array} The kernel.

leadingComments.value:

	 * @return {Float32Array} The kernel.

	 *

	 * @param {Number} x - The texel width.
	 * @param {Number} y - The texel height.

	 * @param {Number} y - The texel height.

*
 * An optimised convolution shader material.
 *
 * Based on the GDC2003 Presentation by Masaki Kawase, Bunkasha Games:
 *  Frame Buffer Postprocessing Effects in DOUBLE-S.T.E.A.L (Wreckless)
 * and an article by Filip Strugar, Intel:
 *  An investigation of fast real-time GPU-based image blur algorithms
 *
 * Further modified according to:
 *  https://developer.apple.com/library/ios/documentation/3DDrawing/Conceptual/OpenGLES_ProgrammingGuide/BestPracticesforShaders/BestPracticesforShaders.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP40008793-CH7-SW15
 *
 * @class ConvolutionMaterial
 * @submodule materials
 * @extends ShaderMaterial
 * @constructor
 * @param {Vector2} [texelSize] - The absolute screen texel size.

 * The Kawase blur kernel presets.
 *
 * @property kernelPresets
 * @type Array
 * @private

*
 * An optimised convolution shader material.
 *
 * Based on the GDC2003 Presentation by Masaki Kawase, Bunkasha Games:
 *  Frame Buffer Postprocessing Effects in DOUBLE-S.T.E.A.L (Wreckless)

trailingComments.value:
*
 * A kernel size enumeration.
 *
 * @class KernelSize
 * @submodule materials
 * @static

leadingComments.value:
*
	 * A very small kernel that matches a 7x7 Gauss blur kernel.
	 *
	 * @property VERY_SMALL
	 * @type Number
	 * @static

*
	 * A small kernel that matches a 15x15 Gauss blur kernel.
	 *
	 * @property SMALL
	 * @type Number
	 * @static

*
	 * A medium sized kernel that matches a 23x23 Gauss blur kernel.
	 *
	 * @property MEDIUM
	 * @type Number
	 * @static

*
	 * A large kernel that matches a 35x35 Gauss blur kernel.
	 *
	 * @property LARGE
	 * @type Number
	 * @static

*
	 * A very large kernel that matches a 63x63 Gauss blur kernel.
	 *
	 * @property VERY_LARGE
	 * @type Number
	 * @static

*
	 * A huge kernel that matches a 127x127 Gauss blur kernel.
	 *
	 * @property HUGE
	 * @type Number
	 * @static

*
 * A kernel size enumeration.
 *
 * @class KernelSize
 * @submodule materials
 * @static

*
 * A kernel size enumeration.
 *
 * @class KernelSize
 * @submodule materials
 * @static

comments.value:
*
 * An optimised convolution shader material.
 *
 * Based on the GDC2003 Presentation by Masaki Kawase, Bunkasha Games:
 *  Frame Buffer Postprocessing Effects in DOUBLE-S.T.E.A.L (Wreckless)
 * and an article by Filip Strugar, Intel:
 *  An investigation of fast real-time GPU-based image blur algorithms
 *
 * Further modified according to:
 *  https://developer.apple.com/library/ios/documentation/3DDrawing/Conceptual/OpenGLES_ProgrammingGuide/BestPracticesforShaders/BestPracticesforShaders.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP40008793-CH7-SW15
 *
 * @class ConvolutionMaterial
 * @submodule materials
 * @extends ShaderMaterial
 * @constructor
 * @param {Vector2} [texelSize] - The absolute screen texel size.

*
		 * The current kernel size.
		 *
		 * @property kernelSize
		 * @type KernelSize
		 * @default KernelSize.LARGE

*
	 * Returns the kernel.
	 *
	 * @method getKernel
	 * @return {Float32Array} The kernel.

*
	 * Sets the texel size.
	 *
	 * @method setTexelSize
	 * @param {Number} x - The texel width.
	 * @param {Number} y - The texel height.

*
 * The Kawase blur kernel presets.
 *
 * @property kernelPresets
 * @type Array
 * @private
 * @static

*
 * A kernel size enumeration.
 *
 * @class KernelSize
 * @submodule materials
 * @static

*
	 * A very small kernel that matches a 7x7 Gauss blur kernel.
	 *
	 * @property VERY_SMALL
	 * @type Number
	 * @static

*
	 * A small kernel that matches a 15x15 Gauss blur kernel.
	 *
	 * @property SMALL
	 * @type Number
	 * @static

*
	 * A medium sized kernel that matches a 23x23 Gauss blur kernel.
	 *
	 * @property MEDIUM
	 * @type Number
	 * @static

*
	 * A large kernel that matches a 35x35 Gauss blur kernel.
	 *
	 * @property LARGE
	 * @type Number
	 * @static

*
	 * A very large kernel that matches a 63x63 Gauss blur kernel.
	 *
	 * @property VERY_LARGE
	 * @type Number
	 * @static

*
	 * A huge kernel that matches a 127x127 Gauss blur kernel.
	 *
	 * @property HUGE
	 * @type Number
	 * @static
